physical_appearance: The image shows a set of items, comprising of a rosary, a chalice, a paten, and a censer. The rosary includes a wooden cross attached to red and white beads. The chalice has a wider base than its top, with a narrow neck joining the two. It is silver in colour. The chalice has spherical bases and it has a yellowish tint on its silvery surface. The silver-coloured censer comes with chains and it has five holes on its body. The lower part of the censer looks ot be a little brownish. A holder is linked to the censer by the silver-coloured chains.
title_text: Syrian Christian Ritual Vessels (Paten, Chalice and Censer) and a rosary Syrian Christian Ritual Vessels (Paten, Chalice and Censer)
subject_terms_1: Saint Thomas Christian (sect) rosaries patens (liturgical vessels) chalices (liturgical vessels) censers implement (object genre) religious objects ceremonial objects
subject_terms_2: Saint Thomas Christian Rosary Censers Chalices Liturgical objects Ceremonial objects
